data.title: Very sturdy. Nice storage box.
data.body: For me the biggest problem with nail clippers was trying to find them. The set of these has a nice storage box and I am always good about putting them away so now a couple of years later, they‚Äôre still in great shape. They work well, sturdy, design, and easy to find in the yellow metal box.

data.title: Sturdy and functional
data.body: Clippers are as expected, comfortable in hand, do the job. Came is a very nice case which I'm grateful for because they won't be immediately apparent to my thieving teen son. ü§£

data.title: Best Nail Clippers!
data.body: I have thick toe nails and the typical nail clippers you find at the drug store never really worked for me. These are a great clipper! They are easy to use and work great for me. I also like that 2 clippers come in this order, I use one pair in my travel bag. Highly recommend.

data.title: Mostly very good.
data.body: I like these clippers because they are very sharp, and the sturdy case included is helpful. They are a bit small to hold, maybe because I have arthritis in my hands. My biggest complaint is that the toenail clipper has a completely flat cutting edge. I know toenails should be cut straight across (almost), but as they are smaller than my toenails, I have to make a few cuts. This leaves a sharp beveled edge, so I have to finish up with a nail file to smooth the sharp edges. But overall I am satisfied.

data.title: Sharp and great quality
data.body: These are definitely sharp and have weight to them, which to me feels like high quality. They come in a small, yellow metal case with a nice foam to fit them. Worth every penny.

data.title: Sharp blades, good grip, effective tool - don‚Äôt be lured by the file
data.body: Great product overall, and it works well. HOWEVER: don‚Äôt buy it for the nail file! I would highly recommend buying yourself a stand-alone one instead. Clippers themselves seem dependable.

data.title: The best!
data.body: I always just assumed a nail clipper was a nail clipper. Nope. You really do want a quality one! This is a quality set! Just a word of caution, these are sharp!! Don‚Äôt let littles handle, they‚Äôre not safety clippers. That said, I‚Äôve purchased several sets. I‚Äôve given to my family members as parts of gifts, and keep them stashed in various rooms in the house, my purse and car.

data.title: Just ok, definitely not ultra sharp.
data.body:
After finally finding them, 3 days away from the last day I could return them. And finally trying them,my opinion is that they are ok for finger nails. But the large ones for toes are not "Ultra Sharp", my old ones that I have had for years are much sharper. But I wanted to try Ultra Sharp,it sounds good doesn't it?
Some of us, as we get older, our toenails thicken, to the point where we can't trim them ourselves, my brothers are really thick. So he has to go to a Podiatrist to get his trimmed. Mine aren't so bad yet but you still want clippers that have a clean effortless cut and you don't end up pulling the nail off because it didn't clip all the way, that can hurt. I decided it wasn't worth the time and effort to ship them back { but I would have,if I had used them when I got them}. If you want a cute box and fingernail clippers these would work. Just not so great for toenails.

data.title: Sharp cutters, nice case
data.body:
These nail clippers are nice. They feel solid and look nice. Edges are sharp and have held up over time. The case is nice and makes it much easier to find them.

I'm not quite sure how to explain it, but I don't find them overly comfortable to use. I've used other clippers that just feel more natural when using them.

The thing really lacking is a nail file. I knew that going in, but it's something that is annoying, having to use one set of clippers for clipping and another for the file function. These are nice, but I wouldn't get them again. Going forward, I'll look for a nice clipper or set of clippers that include a nail file.

data.title: Super well-made; really sharp cut & solidly built
data.body: Not everything that‚Äôs made in China is ‚Äújunk‚Äù, contrary to the herd mentality‚Äôs claims ‚Äî this is a shining example of something that‚Äôs very high quality in design, craftsmanship, & materials, and at a lower price than comps. And it‚Äôs made in China. (*Gasp* from ignorant sheeple who spew that nothing good is ever made in China.) Nail cutting will never be the same after using this beauty. I‚Äôve been using a mediocre Revlon for ages and I‚Äôm so glad I lost it so I could discover this one. Hope the quality stays this high so y‚Äôall can enjoy its amazingness too

data.title: A little tight to start, but good
data.body:
The case these come in is nice, even if I always forget to use it to store between uses.

These look sleek in black and works well. They dont seems to dull very quickly which is a plus. I think my only complaint is they start a bit stiff, but that is only a minor gripe.

The fingernail and toenail clippers both work well and seem well built.

data.title: Opening is small
data.body: The nail cutters are sharp however if you have fungus on your nail, you might have problems using it. The opening of cutters are not wide enough. The small nail cutter will probably be good to use for the kids to trim their fingernails.

data.title: Appear to be Good Quality
data.body: I've only used these clippers a few times so far, bot the finger and toenail ones, and both seem to cut cleanly. They feel fairly sturdy. I kind of like that they're black for a change rather than the usual chrome color that most nail clippers are. My mother is in her 90's and can no longer clip her own toenails so I do it for her and these worked great, even on some of her nails which are overly thick for some reason.

data.title: Eww they fancy
data.body: Ive been using a 40 year old pair that I stole from my parents house. This is an item you should swap into.

data.title: These clippers almost work TOO well!
data.body:
I just received these HAWATOUR nail clippers, and let's just say my life has been forever changed. According to my wife, my fingernails and toe nails are haunting. She said that my nails always look like some sort of gnarled HOOVES and they haunt her dreams. Babies routinely scream at the mere sight of my extremities, with their mothers horrified and attempting to shield their progeny from being force to gaze upon me.

These clippers have solved that problem! I no longer have to use a Dremel-brand oscillating hand saw on my calcified claws. I can now safely dispose of the garage belt sander to would grind down my nails on a weekly basis. These clippers are like napalm for anyone's nails that look like those of an old crone stirring porridge in a decrepit castle. Thanks, HAWATOUR!

data.title: Great quality
data.body: My husband kept taking my nail clippers so I got him these. Now I still these from him. Very good quality nail clippers.

data.title: Great product
data.body: I love that it comes with in a yellow tin case. You can easily just put it back in when you‚Äôre done. Also, it clips great! I got it for me and my kiddos and it‚Äôs easy to use.

data.title: Great strong set
data.body: These come in a tin case. I needed a strong clipper to cut my finger and toe nails. These are it! I have ordered many others but they do not hold up or too flimsy to cut my nails. These make it very easy and the tin case keeps them secure and easy to find when needed. Great set!

data.title: Not expensive, better quality
data.body: They look sharp, work well, don't cost a lot and they come in a fancy box.

data.title: These are heavy duty awesome!
data.body:
Not a flimsy clipper as most can be. Very sturdy and very well made.
My parents are now in a nursing home and when we go to visit, I do the mani/pedis for them. My parents have very thick and healthy nails. These do the job easily!
Just ordered a set for us at home.

data.title: Good quality
data.body: Works.

data.title: Not very grippy
data.body:
These are attractive clippers. The small one; is perhaps too small.
The large one has a finish which LOOKS like it ought to be grippy. But it definitely is not.
If they instead duplicated the nail file surface; and put it up on the top of the handle.
Now THAT would provide a MUCH better non-slip surface.

data.title: Easy and Everything you need
data.body: These are strong and just snap through your nails like its nothing, dont require a lot of pressure. The fingernail clipper is curved and even at the edges it cuts cleanly.

data.title: No Built-in File, But Excellent Trimmers
data.body: Totally fine with there not being a built-in nail file. These clippers are smooth, sharp, and ergonomic.

data.title: Super sharp
data.body: Like the case for the mail close

data.title: Nice and sharp
data.body: Nice set. Good and sharp!

data.title: Perfect
data.body: Especially if you have weakness in hand. Easy to cut nails with no effort really. Thanks

data.title: Work great
data.body: These are nice. I have strong nails and these cut like butter. The case is an excellent addition. 10 out of 10 for the price.

data.title: Bought as for a gift
data.body: Gifting these so I can't say much except the tin makes a nice presentation.

data.title: The best clippers ever!
data.body: The best clippers I have ever used hands down! Nice case too so they don‚Äôt get lost!

data.title: For the price‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶..
data.body:
For the price they earn 5 stars. However that‚Äôs what I get for being cheap. They feel flimsy when cutting my nails. People are posting about how sharp they are and that they cut there fingers‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs probably because they slipped due to the cheap flexible design.

But again, for the price. Packaged nicely, arrived on time, sadly worth 5 stars. Thank you for not over charging me.

data.title: THESE ARE AWESOME GROOMING TOOLS
data.body: THESE ARE AWESOME LITTLE FINGERNAIL CUTTERS AND ARE ANODIZED AND LOOK GREAT AND WORK AWESOME AND I WAS SO HAPPY TO ADD THEM TO MY GROOMING KIT. THEY ARE CUTE AND THE ANODIZING IS VERY SOLIDLY APPLIED.

data.title: Easy to hold.
data.body: I like that the handle has a rough edge which makes it easy to hold and won't slip out of my fingers.

data.title: Excellent clippers
data.body: These are great quality clippers and they work very well.

data.title: Premium Level stuff
data.body: The package is made brazy !! I am so happy about this purchase!!

data.title: Very Sharp!!
data.body: These clippers are so easy to use and are super sharp!! I will definitely be purchasing these as stocking stuffers this year!! If you are searching for great clippers, these are a definite purchase!!

data.title: They work
data.body: Nice set. They work well.

data.title: Amazing as advertised!!!
data.body: Amazing product just as advertised! Thank you

data.title: Works great
data.body: Have only used toenail clippers, but they‚Äôre sharp & easy to hold

data.title: Love
data.body: Actually sharp!

data.title: Smaller one is good
data.body: The smaller one with the curved blades works great, very sharp and easy to hold and use. I've tried using the larger one which i suppose is for thicker toenails, but the straight blade is awkward. Probably would be useful for someone with large toes and really thick nails.

data.title: Worked great!
data.body: Excellent product

data.title: Sharp and precised
data.body: Sturdy and sharp. Good quality

data.title: its worth getting these just to have them and not lose them
data.body: i love the clippers, I keep them in the tin they came in and, in my work bag. so far i have used them about 50 times and only for my nails they stay sharp

data.title: Love them
data.body: Best set of nail clippers I ever had.

data.title: very good product... perfect size...
data.body: very good product... perfect size...

data.title: Clippers
data.body: These clippers are pretty nice. Really sharp

data.title: Nice
data.body: They worked really great

data.title: Nice clippers
data.body: They are sturdy and well made.

data.title: Sharp. Paint falls off easily.
data.body:
Really sharp, and makes the nails really sharp (as in it pierced my own skin when I scratched...) as a result, but that's not a fault of the product. On the other hand, the paint scratches off easily.
I do like the flat design of the toe cutter. It prevents cutting the toe nails too far, and thereby prevents ingrown toe nails from regrowing into flesh.
I also like the case. I do wish the cases between the two different clipper color options could also be of a different color. Currently I'd have to open the case to tell which one is which.

data.title: Love these
data.body: These are so much better than the silver ones. Better bold, easy on hard nails and they work. Wish these had a handle to help when clipping toe nails.

data.title: Good Clippers
data.body: Good clippers that come in tin case so you don't lose them. The nail file isn't impressive, so if you need one of those, order one separately.

data.title: Great quality
data.body:
Work well, excellent quality.
box they come in is handy

data.title: Two great nailcutters
data.body: Both the small one and the big one are easy to use.

data.title: Husband approved
data.body: Bought them as a more ‚Äòmanly‚Äô clipper for my husband. Sleek and durable.

data.title: Sharp
data.body: Good quality. Sharp and sturdy.

data.title: Satisfactory
data.body: These were the bang for the buck.

data.title: Great nail clippers
data.body: Nice box and good quality clippers!

data.title: Sharp and efficient
data.body: Best nail clippers these beat out anything I‚Äôve ever had from a drug store. I get long nails quickly as a woman. But I also play the guitar. So I cannot keep long nails. I have to clip every week before I update the polish my nails. These clippers are the real deal. The small one is great and my husband he uses the bigger one. Get these!

data.title: They work
data.body: But I was surprised to find that the small ones cut more easily than the large ones. Go figure.
